spell.name: Invocation: Eldritch Strike (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: eldritch blast cantrip
For you, the range of eldritch blast is reduced to 5 feet and it becomes a melee spell attack. Make a separate melee spell attack for each beam, dealing 1d12 force damage on hit. Any class features or Eldritch Invocations that affect the range of eldritch blast do not work with this Invocation.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Harmonic Spellcasting (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: Pact of the Strings feature
When you cast a warlock spell with a verbal component while using your pact instrument as your spellcasting focus, the saving throw DC for that spell increases by 1.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Knowledge of Antiquity (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: Pact of the Hourglass feature
When you make an Intelligence (History) check related to an event, in the place where that event took place, you see echos of the past and treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Mirror of Fates (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: Pact of the Chalice feature
You can peer into the uncertain future. Using your Pact Chalice as a spellcasting focus, you can cast augury at-will, without expending a spell slot or material components.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Protective Cowl (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: Pact of the Shroud feature
When you take damage while wearing your Pact Shroud, you can use your reaction to gain resistance to the damage from that attack, but your Pact Shroud disappears, and you must finish a short or long rest before you can summon it again.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Cup of Recovery (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 5th-level, Pact of the Chalice feature
Using your pact chalice as a spellcasting focus, you can use an action to cast lesser restoration without expending a spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Cloak of Winds (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 5th-level, Pact of the Shroud feature
Your pact shroud billows out around you, slowing your fall and allowing you to glide. When you fall, you can subtract up to 100 feet from your fall when calculating your fall damage and can move horizontally 2 feet for every 1 foot you fall.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Iron Grip (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 5th-level, Pact of the Flesh feature
While you have your claws manifested, you gain a climbing speed equal to your movement speed, and you can climb difficult surfaces, including scaling walls and upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Thirsting Claws (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 5th-level, Pact of the Flesh feature
You can attack with your claws twice, instead of once, each time you take the Attack action on your turn. Your claw attacks also count as magical for the sake of overcoming resistance and immunity to non-magical damage.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Cup of Protection (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 7th-level, Pact of the Chalice feature
As an action, a creature of your choice can drink from your Pact Chalice, gaining the effects of death ward. Once used, you must finish a long rest to use this feature again.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Improved Shroud (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 7th-level, Pact of the Shroud feature
While wearing your Pact Shroud while in darkness or shadows, you are considered invisible to any creature that relies on darkvision or devil's sight to see in that darkness.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Time Dilation (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 7th-level, Pact of the Hourglass feature
Once per long rest, you can cast haste, at a level equal to your Pact Magic spell slots, without expending a spell slot.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Cloak of Twilight (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 9th-level, Pact of the Shroud feature
You learn the greater invisibility spell, but it doesn't count against your total number of Spells Known, and you can cast greater invisibility once without expending spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Cursed Flesh (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 9th-level, Pact of the Flesh feature
As a bonus action, you can grant yourself temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1).
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Enchanting Melody (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 9th-level, Pact of the Strings feature
You learn the charm monster spell, but it doesn't count against your total number of Spells Known, and you can cast charm monster once without expending spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Alchemical Restoration (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 15th-level, Pact of the Chalice feature
As an action on your turn, you can cast reincarnate without expending a spell slot or material components. Once you cast reincarnate in this way, you must finish 1d4 long rests before you can cast the spell in this way again.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Eldritch Flight (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 15th-level, Pact of the Flesh feature
As a bonus action, you can manifest (or dismiss) wings reminiscent of your Patron's physical form, granting you a flying speed equal to your walking speed.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Invocation: Temporal Rewind (HB)
spell.text:
Prerequisite: 15th-level, Pact of the Hourglass feature
As a reaction when you finish your turn, you can undo everything that happened on your turn. You return to the space you began that turn in and you regain all resources you expended. You can then immediately repeat your turn. Once you use this feature you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
Source: LaserLlama's Warlock Patrons - Boons & Invocations v2.1.0 p. 13 (Homebrew)
